place.name: FORGLEN
place.gazetteerText: Forglen, par., NE. Banffshire, 6249 ac., pop. 744; P.O.; the church is 2 miles W. of Turriff; 2½ miles NW. of Turriff is Forglen House (15th century, rebuilt 1842), seat of the Abercrombies of Birkenbog. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
